🏷️ Hashtag Post Helper: Chrome Extension for Smart Social Media Hashtags

Transform your social media posts with Hashtag Post Helper, a Chrome extension that uses AI to generate relevant and engaging hashtags for your content.

✨ Key Features: 

• AI-Powered Hashtag Generation using Google's Gemini API 
• Smart Content Analysis 
• Permanent Hashtag Management 
• One-Click Copy Function 
• Custom Hashtag Input 
• Real-time Character Count

🎯 Smart Features: 

• Analyze your post content automatically 
• Generate contextually relevant hashtags 
• Save frequently used hashtags 
• Easy copy and paste functionality •
 Clean and intuitive interface

🎨 Customization Options: 

• Add and manage permanent hashtags 
• Customize hashtag generation 
• Preview generated hashtags 
• Quick copy functionality 
• Dark/Light theme support

💡 Perfect For: 

• Content Creators 
• Social Media Managers 
• Digital Marketers 
• Business Owners 
• Regular Social Media Users

🔒 Privacy & Security: 

• Secure API integration with Google's Gemini 
• Local storage for preferences 
• No data collection 
• Safe and reliable Chrome extension

🚀 Getting Started:

Install the Chrome extension
Enter your Gemini API key
Write or paste your content
Generate hashtags
Copy and use in your posts
Try Hashtag Post Helper today and enhance your social media posts with AI-powered hashtag suggestions!

💰 Pricing: 

• 7-day free trial 
• $10/year for unlimited access
